English: Macclesfield Bank, series of reefs in the South China Sea southeast of Hainan Island

d.f: `群島~`名~。`我國~`南海~`諸~`島~`中~`四大~`群島~`之~`一~，`隸屬~`於~`海南島~。`位於~`西沙群島~`東南~，`分布~`略~`成~`橢圓形~。`為~`一群~`尚未~`露出~`水面~`的~`珊瑚礁~`灘~。

English: Macclesfield Bank, series of reefs in the South China Sea southeast of Hainan Island
